events.message: We have received the candidate's application for the software engineer role. The resume shows strong experience in backend development and cloud systems.
The application has been categorized under Engineering as the candidate's skills align with the software developer position we are hiring for.
Recruiter John Smith has been assigned to manage this candidateâ€™s hiring process, specializing in engineering roles.
Initial phone screening was completed successfully. The candidate demonstrated a solid understanding of software architecture and DevOps tools.
Candidate has responded positively to the initial screening feedback and expressed eagerness to proceed to the technical interview stage.
The technical interview has been scheduled for May 15th at 2 PM UTC, involving senior engineers and focus on backend challenges.
